<h1 align="center">The Crash Programming Language</h1>

<p align="center">
<a href="https://crash-lang.org"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/website-%23.svg?style=for-the-badge&logoColor=white&color=%23F94144&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64," alt="label"/></a>

<b>This project is heavily work in progress! Don't expect anything to work.</b>

This is the main source code repository for the [Crash Website](https://crash-lang.org).
